newsitem.title: UK: UK grain futures close lower on currency.
newsitem.headline: UK grain futures close lower on currency.

text.p: UK grain futures were closed lower on Friday with currency the main factor in the market.
"The market is being driven by currency, because there is nothing else going on," said a trader.
Wheat futures close 0.35 to 0.20 stg down after trading 528 lots while barley was 0.75 stg down on 98 lots.
Amsterdam milling wheat futures were neglected.
Cash market traders reported little activity although Jan/Mar feed wheat fetching 97 stg and May 99 and 99.50 stg a tonne fob east coast ports.
"It's been a very difficult week, there has been no continuity in trade," said a trader.
